title: Porsche SE
summary: Porsche Automobil Holding SE, usually shortened to  Porsche SE (German pronunciation: [ˈpɔɐ̯ʃə] (listen)),[5] is a German multinational corporation primarily known as a holding company of Volkswagen Group with investments in the automotive industry. Porsche SE is headquartered in Zuffenhausen, a city district of Stuttgart, Baden-Württemberg and is majority owned by the Austrian-German Porsche-Piëch family.[lower-alpha 1][6] The company was founded in Stuttgart as Dr. Ing. h.c. F. Porsche GmbH in 1931 by Ferdinand Porsche (1875–1951)[7] and his son-in-law Anton Piëch (1894–1952).
